name: Bricks in the Void
description:
An 'Arkanoid' clone made using Three.js for university module 3.

Use arrows to change the launch angle of the ball, and then move the paddle when the ball has been launched. Break all bricks on screen to progress through all 9 unique level layouts and obtain the highest score you can.

Powerups have a chance to spawn when bricks are broken, and can either be green for a buff or red for a debuff. However, red powerups have a chance to be an extra life - will you risk it?
